mapper.select: select * from(select t.*,rownum rn from(select * from usertbl where characterid='1' and username like #{name})t where rownum <= #{end}) where rn >= #{start}
select * from usertbl where characterid='1' and username like #{name}
select * from(select t.*,rownum rn from(select * from usertbl where characterid='2' and username like #{name})t where rownum <= #{end}) where rn >= #{start}
select * from usertbl where characterid='2' and username like #{name}
